exclusion.criterion: History of hepatotoxic drug intake or alcohol use
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: >20g/day, or any evidence of chronic liver disease in the past, at presentation or during follow-up
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 17 year old boy with vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite for the past 3 days. Shiga-like toxin-producing E. coli (STEC) stx1/stx2 were found in stools.
